title: Covid-19 Vaccines | Mauliola Pharmacy | Wailuku
cleaned_text: Tel: 808-446-3348 Tel: 808-633-4140 Excellence in Body and Spirit We are currently offering COVID-19 Vaccinations at the pharmacy (Pfizer and Moderna Monovalent/Bivalent) for patients ages 6 months and up. We also offer mobile vaccine services for those who are unable to come to the pharmacy in person. First dose, Second dose, and bivalent booster doses are offered: Patient Age = 6 Months to 4 years old Monday: 9:00 PM - 1:00 PM Wednesday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM Friday: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM Patient Age > 4 years old Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM Walk-ins accepted for ages 5 yrs and up. Appointment required for ages 4 yrs and younger. We are open to the general public.
